data.name: plNofify.Help
data.value: If checked, the forum supports email notifications.

data.name: plAutomatedAddress.Help
data.value: The from email address used on all outgoing forum emails.

data.name: plEmailAddressDisplayName.Help
data.value: The friendly display name used on outgoing emails sent from this module.

data.name: plEmailQueueTask.Help
data.value:
If checked, email notifications will be sent using a background scheduled task.
NOTE:
This can only be enabled if the host has enabled the Forum's scheduled StartEmailQueuedTasks task in the core scheduler.

data.name: plEnableEditEmails.Help
data.value: If checked, users will receive email notifications when posts are edited.

data.name: plEnableListServer.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be able to post to the forums via email. This requires enabling of from address per forum as well as installation of a third party scheduled task.

data.name: plEnablePerForumFrom.Help
data.value: If checked, module administrators will be able to associate a from email address (and from name) per individual forum.

data.name: plListServerFolder.Help
data.value: The folder emails will be downloaded to for forum post parsing. (Same requirements as List Server)
